# ipam_pool (Resource)

An IPAM Pool represents an IP address range that sub-ranges can be allocated from

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "ipam_pool" "lan" {
  cidr = "10.0.0.0/8"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cidr` (String) CIDR to allocate from

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Pool identifier
